desc: Hypnotherapy sessions in Bristol, online and by telephone. Qualified Solution Focused Hypnotherapist. Therapy blog and hypnotherapy audios. Use the healing power of hypnosis to overcome anxiety, depression, phobias, stress, anger, OCD, trauma and more. Bristol hypnotherapist, Jon Creffield. Clifton and Westbury-on-Trym
